mapper.select: select b.* from (select rownum rm, a.* from (select p.*, u.user_nickname from moons_point p, moons_user u where (p.point_donater=1 and u.user_code=p.point_receiver) or (p.point_receiver=1 and u.user_code=p.point_donater) order by point_date desc)a)b where rm>#{start} and rm<=#{start}+8
